header.title: Who are we?
header.aboutus: Access Barrier UK Ltd, Design, Manufacture and Install automatic barriers, automatics sliding gates, cantilever gates, telescopic sliding gates, turnstiles, manual barriers, manual parking barriers, height restriction barriers and automatic swing gates. Based in Halesowen in the West Midlands we offer friendly advice to anyone considering purchasing gates or barriers to their residential or commercial property and getting you a cost effective solution for your requirements.  With our skilled fabricators and design office we can design and manufacture a customer built gate to suit your requirements.
header.contactDetail: Access Barrier UK Ltd, provided delivery at request and can install turnstile at an additional cost, please ask sales for pricing.
